steps.notes: Implemented UI for Installments and Recurrence in 'add-transaction.tsx'. Added 'createComplexTransaction' in 'FinancialService' to handle batch generation. Fixed lint errors.

decisions.title: Strategy for Installments and Recurrence
decisions.description: Implement 'Installments' and 'Recurrence' by generating multiple future transaction records. This avoids complex schema migrations for now and works with existing reporting. Installment logic will respect credit card closing days implicitly by setting future dates. Recurrence will support various frequencies (weekly, biweekly, etc).
